full_summary:
Title
----------------
SSC FileMaker Pro or Equivalent for Health Canada
===============

### Solicitation Details

| Key Information | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | BPM021181/26109 |
| Posting Date | 2024-03-18 |
| Closing Date | 2024-04-03T14:00:00 |
| Status | Expired |
| Category | Goods and Services (GD) |

### Tender Overview

This solicitation aims to procure FileMaker Pro or equivalent software for Health Canada. Amendment 001 has been issued to address supplier questions and modify Annex B – Deliverables.

### Eligibility

This tender is open to all eligible bidders. Suppliers must register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit their response.

### How to Register

To register, please visit [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click on 'Register Now'.

### Contract Information

* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None
* Contracting entity: Shared Services Canada
* End user (fgeneral usage : Shared Services Canada

### Contact Information

Please contact:
Javier Ventura
3435769329
3435769329

or email us to obtain detailed contact information
